name: Steven Test
subject: {{contact.firstname}}, what’s your home really worth now? See $2.28B sold insights
headline: Your home’s story isn’t over yet
subheadline: Life’s changed. Your home can too.
body_copy: And maybe you’ve outgrown your place or it’s time to downsize. We get it. Families grow, jobs shift, and sometimes your home just doesn’t fit like it used to. But you’ve built something valuable here. The equity could unlock your next chapter. So why guess when you can see your options clearly? We’ll help you figure out what fits your life now — no pressure, just a plan that makes sense to you.

name: Cash Buyer Equity Unlock 2024
subject: {{contact.firstname}} — Unlock $350K+ in equity, hassle-free
headline: You’ve built equity. Now let it work for you.
subheadline: Sell your home fast, keep privacy, and move on your terms.
cta_text: Show me my plan, no pressure
body_copy:
You’ve watched your home’s value grow. So what’s next? Maybe it’s a bigger yard for your kids or a smaller place that frees up cash for your next move. But timing the market and taxes can feel like a maze. And no one wants surprises or delays. 

So we make it simple. We help you sell for top dollar, faster, with full discretion. And we handle the details that can trip you up — so you get more in hand, without the hassle. 

Because when you’re ready to unlock equity, you want it done right — smooth, private, and on your schedule.

name: Q2 Cash Buyer Equity Unlock
subject: {{contact.firstname}} — unlock $350K+ from your home, fast
headline: Your home’s equity, ready when you are
subheadline: No hassle. No waiting. Just cash in your pocket for your next move.
cta_text: Show me my options, no sales pitch
body_copy:
So you’re sitting on equity tied up in a home. But timing the market feels risky. And selling usually means headaches. We get it. You want speed, privacy, and max cash — without the guesswork or delays. 

And you want to keep your next move flexible. Whether it’s downsizing, upgrading, or seizing a new investment. We help you unlock your home’s value quickly. Then you decide what’s next — with cash in hand and no stress.

Let’s cut through the noise. We’ll show you exactly what your home can net you today, the options that fit your goals, and a painless way forward.

name: In-State Absentee Owner Portfolio Optimize
subject: {{contact.firstname}}, your Florida portfolio could earn $45K more this year
headline: Your properties should work as hard as you do
subheadline: And we’ll help you see which ones pay off, which don’t, and how to get more from both
body_copy:
You own 2+ Florida properties. Managing them from a distance isn’t easy. So many moving parts, maintenance costs eating into returns, and the market changing fast. 

But what if you had a clear picture? Which properties to hold, which to sell, and when. And how to use tools like a 1031 exchange to optimize your portfolio’s cash flow and tax strategy.

We’ve helped investors just like you turn exhausting oversight into strategic moves. You get easy options, numbers that make sense, and fewer headaches. No sales pitch—just a friendly conversation to map your next step.

name: Out-of-State Owner Sell Simplify
subject: {{contact.firstname}}, turn your Florida property into $320K cash
headline: Your Florida home can pay off now
subheadline: We get you top market value without the hassle from afar
body_copy:
So you haven’t seen your Florida place in a while. And that’s tough when you can’t keep an eye on it. But we’ll be your eyes and ears here — watching the market, handling offers, and protecting your interests. 

And with Florida prices up, your home could be worth more than you think. We help absentee owners like you get fair market value — no surprises, no long wait. 

You don’t have to worry about hurricanes or insurance changes alone. We’ll guide you through the local risks and simplify the process, so you can focus on what’s next for you.
